author: Home Repair Tutor
description: CPVC plumbing repair tips…I cut out this tee because it’s not needed and used a SharkBite Max coupling to make the pipe connections. I made square cuts, deburred both pipes and marked the depth. The SharkBite Max slides on easily and is great for PEX A, PEX B, and copper 🔥 #plumbing #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #homerepairtutor
title: CPVC Plumbing Repair Tips - #shorts #plumbing #homerepairtutor
